prompt:
Describe a time when you had to resolve a conflict between two or more parties and how you managed to do so.
I recall a situation where I needed to mediate between two colleagues who had been at odds due to a disagreement over project management styles. My approach involved listening carefully to both sides, understanding their concerns, and then facilitating open communication by encouraging them to express their viewpoints without interruption. I also provided constructive feedback on areas requiring improvement and emphasized the importance of collaboration in achieving our common goal.
